author: Hugh Kennedy <hughskennedy@gmail.com> (http://hughskennedy.com)
name: kss
description: NodeJS port of kss: A methodology for documenting CSS and generating styleguides

scripts.test: echo 'Testing with mocha…' && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -u tdd --reporter spec && echo 'Linting with eslint…' && ./node_modules/.bin/eslint . && echo '…tests done.'
